select count(*) from events e left join activities a on e.activity_id =a.activity_id left join locations l on e.location_id =l.location_id where 1=1
AND (a.activity_type = #{category} or a.activity_semi_type =#{category})
AND l.suburb=#{location}
AND e.event_start_time_24hr < '12:00:00'
AND e.event_end_time_24hr > '12:00:00' and e.event_start_time_24hr < '18:00:00'
AND e.event_end_time_24hr > '18:00:00'

select e.event_id,e.event_name,e.event_date ,e.event_start_time_24hr ,e.event_end_time_24hr ,e.event_image_path ,l.location_name,l.address_1 ,l.street ,l.suburb ,l.city from events e left join activities a on e.activity_id =a.activity_id left join locations l on e.location_id =l.location_id where 1=1
AND (a.activity_type = #{category} or a.activity_semi_type =#{category})
AND l.suburb=#{location}
AND e.event_start_time_24hr < '12:00:00'
AND e.event_end_time_24hr > '12:00:00' and e.event_start_time_24hr < '18:00:00'
AND e.event_end_time_24hr > '18:00:00'
order by e.event_id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
